attributes.action: Introduce upper limits on the number of permanent road signs in any 1 mile stretch of road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The roads in this country are increasingly cluttered by large numbers of signs that cause so much distraction to drivers they are contributing to accidents. What is needed are limits on the number of road signs in any 1 mile stretch of road. This would sort out which signs are actually needed and which are just causing dangerous distractions.
